text: Habit or Habits may refer to: * Habit (psychology), an acquired pattern of behavior that often occurs automatically * Habit (biology) is the form of growth of an animal or plant * Habit (clothing), for example, as worn by monks or nuns * Drug addiction is sometimes referred to as "having a drug habit" * Habituation, a basic activity in which an animal responds less to stimuli ==Related pages== * Habitat * Instinct io:Kustumo
title: Habit
